mapper.sql: id, type, menu_name, parent_id, level, url, visible, order_num, perms, icon, create_by, create_time
mapper.update: update sys_menu set type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visible = #{visible,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, perms = #{perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select m.url as `key`, r.code as value from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join sys_role r on rm.role_id = r.id where m.url is not null and m.url != ''

select m.url, GROUP_CONCAT(r.code SEPARATOR ',') as ofRoles from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join sys_role r on rm.role_id = r.id where m.visible = '0' GROUP BY m.url

select distinct m.* from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join sys_role r on r.id = rm.role_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and m.visible = '0' and m.type in ('M', 'C') order by m.order_num
select distinct m.*, m.menu_name as "meta.title", m.icon as "meta.icon" from sys_menu m where m.visible = '0' and m.type in ('M', 'C') order by m.order_num
